Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 45.
_description: A Nativity carol — four 5-line stanzas (abccb in which first and third lines have leonine rhyme) including refrain, ‘Deo gracias’, plus burden (bb with medial rhyme): ‘Now let vs syng both more & lesse / Of Criste commyng Deo gracias’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
A virgyn pure this is full sureGabriell dide her
                    grete…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Therfor we syng both old & yongeOf Cristis
                    commyngeDeo graciasExplicit
OxfBal354.Facsimiles:
Early Manuscripts at Oxford University: Facsimile
                    of Oxford, Balliol MS 354.
         (http://image.ox.ac.uk/show?collection=balliol&manuscript=ms354).
